fields.Title: Last Mile Distribution Process: As-Is Workshop Report
fields.Outlet (if applicable): Submitted to Process Leads and Leadership of The Idaho Foodbank
fields.Description/Abstract:
This deliverable was one of several created for a process reengineering effort with The Idaho Foodbank. This technical report summarizes the work of the 3/2/21 As-Is workshop to create a map of the Last Mile Distribution process. The report contained the following contents:
A. LMD Background Information
B. Priorities
     * Where do we need to focus efforts on improving LMD?
C. Level 1 Diagram
D. Level 2 Diagrams
     * 1.0 Recognize the need - Partner agency communication (order or request) -  create order
     * 2.0 Formal order review inventory & ability to fulfill
     * 3.0 Pick and pack order
     * 4.0 Stage order
     * 5.0 Process paperwork - completed with product amount & weight
     * 6.0 Load truck
     * 7.0 Deliver and receipts order
     * 8.0 Return food (optional)
     * 9.0 Paperwork given to IC
E. Supporting Tables
     1. Stakeholders & Success Criteria
     2. Major Controls by Process Activity
     3. Major Pain Points & Disconnects by Process Activity
F. Other Opportunities for Improvement
